items.name: Chapter 3 – Card 01: Landing at Anse Gaulette
items.clue: Coordinates: -4.7333, 55.5167 - Where the journey begins

items.name: Chapter 3 – Card 02: The Carved Rock
items.clue: Cipher Fragment: 'XIII + VII = XX, follow the rising sun'

items.name: Chapter 3 – Card 03: Fog at Lazare Picault
items.clue: Directional Riddle: 'When mist clears at dawn, follow the golden ray northwest'

items.name: Chapter 3 – Card 04: The Hidden Waterfall
items.clue: Numerical Pattern: 3-7-11-? (Count the falls to find the next)

items.name: Chapter 3 – Card 05: The Pirate's Parrot
items.clue: Torn Map Piece: '...cave entrance marked by three palms...'

items.name: Chapter 3 – Card 06: Cave of Echoes
items.clue: Coordinate Digits: 'VII-V hidden in wall symbols, seek the southern passage'

items.name: Chapter 3 – Card 07: The Compass in the Sand
items.clue: Partial Direction: 'Northwest 47 degrees, count the waves to shore'

items.name: Chapter 3 – Card 08: Port Launay Shadows
items.clue: Tide Riddle: 'When moon is full and tide is high, the phantom cargo comes to light'

items.name: Chapter 3 – Card 09: The Rock Pool Secret
items.clue: Cipher Key Fragment: 'Reflection shows truth: A=1, S=19, K=11'

items.name: Chapter 3 – Card 10: The Watcher's Skull
items.clue: Path Riddle: 'Left leads to death, right to gold, choose wisely bold'

items.name: Chapter 3 – Card 11: Map Fragment I
items.clue: Half Coordinate: 'S 4° 44' -- E 55° 31' (western fragment)'

items.name: Chapter 3 – Card 12: The Crossed Blades
items.clue: Latin Phrase: 'Fideles usque ad mortem' - Faithful unto death

items.name: Chapter 3 – Card 13: Coconut Grove Ambush
items.clue: Betrayal Symbol: 'Trust no man when gold is near - marked by crossed daggers'

items.name: Chapter 3 – Card 14: The Sunken Chest
items.clue: Hidden Sequence: '7-3-11-9 - depths where treasure lies'

items.name: Chapter 3 – Card 15: Torch of Secrets
items.clue: Cryptogram Fragment: 'WKHUH OLHV WKH WUHDVXUH RI OHYDVVHXU'

items.name: Chapter 3 – Card 16: The False Trail
items.clue: Choice Riddle: 'Follow the parrot's call, not the skull's stare'

items.name: Chapter 3 – Card 17: Map Fragment II
items.clue: Complete Coordinate: 'S 4° 44' 12" - E 55° 31' 27" (eastern fragment)'

items.name: Chapter 3 – Card 18: The Pirate's Ghost
items.clue: Ghostly Riddle: 'Beyond the mist, where eagles nest, lies what you seek'

items.name: Chapter 3 – Card 19: The Final Cave
items.clue: Chapter 3 Cipher: 'In depths of stone, where light does glow, the final truth at last you'll know'

items.name: Chapter 3 – Card 20: Chapter Finale – Torn Map Piece
items.clue: Chapter 4 Teaser: 'Where Coco de Mer grows, greater treasures await discovery'
